data.title: The Bishop's School
data.text:
From Bishop's, Associate Dean of Students Shane Walton '98 went on to the University of Notre Dame, played in the National Football League, started a non-profit foundation and came full circle back to Bishop's. Hear his story.

Isaiah Dawson '18 found that the support he received at Bishop's and its nurturing environment led him to embark on a successful academic and athletic career at Harvard.

When you've had four children attend Bishop's and you've served in multiple parent volunteer roles, you know the School quite well! Hear more from alumni parent Barbara Kyrillos.

Recent graduate Eliana Petreikis '20 shares how extracurricular opportunities defined her sense of self at Bishop's. She enthusiastically took the School's advice to get involve in the community and made the most of her experience while encouraging others to connect.
